changeSet.author: edapper
changeSet.sql:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[RegiaoAdministrativa]') AND type in (N'U'))
BEGIN CREATE TABLE RegiaoAdministrativa (IDRegiaoAdministrativa INT NOT NULL IDENTITY(1,1), dsRegiaoAdministrativa VARCHAR(50) NULL, PRIMARY KEY (IDRegiaoAdministrativa)); END

rollback.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[RegiaoAdministrativa]') AND type in (N'U'))
DROP TABLE [dbo].[RegiaoAdministrativa]
